name: Dr Fission
description:
Dr. Fission is a chaotic 2D puzzle platformer with puzzle game mechanics. You play as "Dr. Fission" a sole survivor scientist who must escape from his lab where an explosion took place a few weeks back.

There are many uranium atoms around the lab, and you are equipped with your trusty Neutron Gun. The escape won't be easy as the energy is down, and the gates are closed. But don't worry you can easily use neutrons to split uranium atoms and hence use their radioactive power to open the gates.

Be careful while using your gun,  a few shots of your neutron gun, and the uranium atoms will cause a lot of CHAOS! 

But be wary, the uranium atoms are harmful! 

Controls
  • WASD to move the character
  • W is used to jump
  • Use Mouse to aim and shoot neutrons

You can directly play in browser. Otherwise, download for PC for best experience!

There are a few levels only, due to time constraints, more levels will be added soon :D
